channel.title: How do I make NPC's not interrupt emotes/gfx's
channel.description: I am working on DeathzScape source (delta), now I have made claw specs work on npcs. How do I make it so npc's won't interrupt any emotes/gfx's.

item.description:
@itai wrote:

I am working on DeathzScape source (delta), now I have made claw specs work on npcs. How do I make it so npc’s won’t interrupt any emotes/gfx’s.
